title: Untitled
provenance_text:
Tomonori Toyofuku [b. 1925], Milan, Italy, until December 1964; Galleria George Lester, Rome, Italy [1]; purchased by Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, May 1965 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was no. 185 (illustrated in the catalogue) in "The 1964 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1964 - January 1965. It was lent by Galleria George Lester, Rome, Italy, as the artist's agent.
[2]. The sculpture was awarded the William Frew Memorial Prize at the 1964 International and was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the exhibition. Payments (including partial payment directly to the artist and to the Italian shippers) were sent on December 16, 1964 (see curatorial file for relevant communications.) The sculpture was accessioned the following year, on May 11, 1965.
